acceptanceOfTerms: By using our services, you agree to the collection and processing of:
Real-time location data for route optimization
Historical routing data to improve AI models
serviceDescription: We provide a platform for scheduling and optimizing delivery routes using AI technology.
Our services are designed to help you manage your delivery operations more efficiently.
You can schedule routes, view real-time updates, and receive automated route suggestions.
dataUsage: By using our services, you agree to the collection and processing of:
Real-time location data for route optimization
Vehicle specifications for fuel efficiency calculations
Historical routing data to improve AI models
subscriptionTerms: Cancellations must be made 48 hours before renewal

Price changes communicated 30 days in advance
userFeedback: Voluntary feedback provided through our platform becomes our exclusive property. By submitting feedback, you grant us a perpetual, royalty-free license to use, modify, and incorporate it into our services without compensation.
You waive any rights to attribution or compensation for feedback used in service improvements or feature development.
userResponsibilities: Provide accurate location and vehicle information
Maintain proper insurance coverage for commercial operations
Comply with all local traffic laws and regulations
